column1: In  view  of  the  contention  of  the  learned  Counsel  for  the  appellant  that  there
was  not  enough  evidence  and  the  learned  High  Court  Judge  failed  to  place
before the jury material evidence and also, he was misdirected in his summing
up  to  the  jury,  I  find  it  necessary  to  consider  the  way  a  case  should  be
established before a Court of law by way of circumstantial evidence.
